tweets.text:
So here is my thread on insufficient info:

1) All human success is based on information. As a human moves from insufficient info to more information, he gets onto the ladder of success. https://t.co/1RH8xGtJ0s
2) Gossiping is an attempt of trying to move from insufficient information to the information state.
3) All the past battles whether for kingdom or of science are information battles. An army who has better information of his enemy wins. A group of scientists who have better insights win.

No matter how much of information we have, it will always be insufficient.Our information is limited by our sense organs. You can never see things outside your frequency range. Even if you develop something that enables you too, you can never be sure if you are missing something.

5) We can safely assume that information is one of the supreme forces of nature. Animals that have less information of their predator are killed. Animals who have less information of where they would find food die hungry.

6) Humans love to feel "safe" and "secure". That is the reason most like to be in "don't even know what they don't know about" state than in "Don't know" state. Believing that there is no information missing gives one a false sense of safety.
7) If you think you have all the information, you can safely believe that you have "insufficient information"
